name: Infrasoft Technologies
overview:
Infrasoft Technologies Limited delivers IPR based software products, solutions, and services in the domains of retail banking, investment banking, eChannels, trading, wealth management, Islamic finance, anti money laundering, and compliance frameworks. Its products include OMNIEnterprise: Core Banking Solution, an integrated banking solution that is designed to create new business models for banks; OMNIEnterprise: Microfinance Solution, which provides an integrated application that addresses the life-cycle of lending process from origination, servicing, and collection and recovery; and OMNIEnterprise: Islamic Banking, a Shariah compliant core banking solution that provides a solution to evolve complex financial products. The companyâ€™s products also include OMNIEnterprise: Wealth Management, which provides a data model that consolidates various assets under management and extends the data services to various channels. Further, the company provides testing strategies and services, offshore development and onshore integration services, and managed services.

Infrasoft Technologies Limited was founded in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India with operations in the United Kingdom, the United States, and the Middle East. The company has locations in Mumbai and Bangalore, India; London and Jersey, the United Kingdom; Somerset, New Jersey; Dubai, the United Arab Emirates; Manama, the Kingdom of Bahrain; Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia; and Singapore, Singapore.

funding_rounds.source_description: Baring invest 100 crore in Infrasoft Technologies
